about: - Syntax : about [] 	 | 	 Description : display small informations about me in the terminal. (get to know me a little !)
repo: - Syntax : repo [] 	 | 	 Description : display the github repository of this project in the terminal !
email: - Syntax : email [] 	 | 	 Description : open a tab to email me directly !
github: - Syntax : github [] 	 | 	 Description : display my github profile !
linkedin: - Syntax : linkedin [] 	 | 	 Description : display my linkedin profile !
echo: - Syntax : echo [message] 	 | 	 Description : display the message that was passed as an argument in the terminal !
whoami: - Syntax : whoami [] 	 | 	 Description : display your username in the terminal !
ls: - Syntax : ls [] 	 | 	 Description : display the directories and/or files in the current directory in the terminal !
cd: - Syntax : cd [destination directory] 	 | 	 Description : go to the specified [destination directory]
date: - Syntax : date [] 	 | 	 Description : display the current date and time
vi: - Syntax : vi [path/filename] 	 | 	 Description : opens the vi text editor for the specified file !(easter egg here !!!)
vim: - Syntax : vim [path/filename] 	 | 	 Description : opens the vi text editor for the specified file ! (easter egg here !!!)
nvim: - Syntax : nvim [path/filename] 	 | 	 Description : opens the vi text editor for the specified file ! (easter egg here !!!)
emacs: - Syntax : emacs [path/filename] 	 | 	 Description : opens the vi text editor for the specified file ! (easter egg here !!!)
sudo: - Syntax : sudo [command] 	 | 	 Description : executes the specified command as super user ! (easter egg here !!!)
banner: - Syntax : banner [] 	 | 	 Description : display the ascii art with my name and job title !
projects: - Syntax projects [] 	 | 	 Description : display my projects in the terminal !
quote: - Syntax quote [] 	 | 	 Description : display a random quote in the terminal !
weather: - Syntax weather [city] 	 | 	 Description : display the weather for [city] for the current day and the next 2 days in the terminal !
help: - Syntax help [] 	 | 	 Description : display the help menu in the terminal !
resume: - Syntax resume [] 	 | 	 Description : open my resume in pdf format in another tab !
summary: - Syntax summary [] 	 | 	 Description : display a short summary in ascii art about me in the terminal !
